arabicText: إِن تَجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَبَآئِرَ مَا تُنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ نُكَفِّرْ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَنُدْخِلْكُم مُّدْخَلًۭا كَرِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
If	you	keep	avoiding	the	cardinal	sins	that	
are	 forbidden	to	you,	We	will	 forgive	you	
your	 other	 (lesser)	 sins	 and	 admit	 you	
into	a	noble	place.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	bachte	raho	kabira	gunāhoñ	se	jin	ki	tumheiñ	mumani‘at	hai	 to	 tumhāre	aur	gunāh	ham	
bakhsh	deñge	aur	tumheiñ	izzat	ki	jagah	dākhil	kareñge

arabicText: وَلَا تَتَمَنَّوْا۟ مَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ بَعْضَكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ لِّلرِّجَالِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا ٱكْتَسَبُوا۟ ۖ وَلِلنِّسَآءِ نَصِيبٌۭ مِّمَّا ٱكْتَسَبْنَ ۚ وَسْـَٔلُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	long	for	things	by	which	Allah
has	given	superiority	to	some	of	you	over	
others;	 for	men	is	 the	share	of	what	 they	
earn;	and	for	women	the	share	from	what	
they	 earn;	 and	 seek	 from	 Allah His	
munificence;	 indeed	 Allah knows	
everything
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	ki	ārzu	na	karo	jis	se	Allah	ne	tum	meiñ	ek	ko	doosre	par	badāi	di	mardoñ	ke	liye	unki	
kamāyi	se	hissa	hai	aur	aurtoñ	ke	liye	unki	kamāyi	se	hissa aur	Allah	se	uska	fazl	māñgo	beshak	
Allah	sab	kuch	jānta	hai.

arabicText: وَلِكُلٍّۢ جَعَلْنَا مَوَٰلِىَ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ٱلْوَٰلِدَانِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبُونَ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ عَقَدَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ فَـَٔاتُوهُمْ نَصِيبَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 for	 all,	 We	 have	 appointed	 heirs	 - from	 whatever	 the	 parents	 and	 near	 relatives	 leave	
behind;	and	to	those	with	whom	you	have	made	an	agreement,	give	them	their	dues;	indeed	all	
things	are	present	before	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	sab	ke	liye	māl	me	mustahiq	banā	diye	haiñ	jo	kuch	chord	jāyeñ	mā	bāp	aur	qarābat	
wāle	aur	woh	jin	se	tumhāra	halaf	bandh	chukā	unheiñ	unka	hissa	do	beshak	har	cheez	Allah	ke	
sāmne	hai.

arabicText: ٱلرِّجَالُ قَوَّٰمُونَ عَلَى ٱلنِّسَآءِ بِمَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ وَبِمَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنْ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ ۚ فَٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ قَـٰنِتَـٰتٌ حَـٰفِظَـٰتٌۭ لِّلْغَيْبِ بِمَا حَفِظَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱلَّـٰتِى تَخَافُونَ نُشُوزَهُنَّ فَعِظُوهُنَّ وَٱهْجُرُوهُنَّ فِى ٱلْمَضَاجِعِ وَٱضْرِبُوهُنَّ ۖ فَإِنْ أَطَعْنَكُمْ فَلَا تَبْغُوا۟ عَلَيْهِنَّ سَبِيلًا ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيًّۭا كَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Men	are	in	charge	of	women,	as	Allah has	
made	 one	 of	 them	 superior	 to	 the	 other,	
and	 because	 men	 spend	 their	 wealth	 for	
the	 women;	 so	 virtuous	 women	 are	 the	
reverent	 ones,	 guarding	 behind	 their	
husbands	 the	 way	 Allah has	 decreed	
guarding;	and	the	women	from	whom	you	
fear	 disobedience,	 (at	 first)	 advise	 them	
and	(then)	do	not	cohabit	with	 them,	and	
(lastly)	beat	 them;	 then	if	 they	 obey	 you,	
do	 not	 seek	 to	 do	 injustice	 to	 them;	
indeed	Allah is	Supreme,	Great.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mard	afsar	haiñ	aurtoñ	par	is	liye	ke	Allah	
ne	un	meiñ	ek	ko	doosre	par	fazilat	di	aur	
is	 liye	 ke	 mardoñ	 ne	 un	 par	 apne	 māl	
kharch	 kiye	 to	 nek	 bakht	 aurteiñ	 adab	
wāliyāñ	 haiñ	 khāwand	 ke	 peeche	 hifāzat	
rakhti	 haiñ	 jis	 tarah	 Allah	 ne	 hifāzat	 ka	
hukm	diyā	aur	jin	aurtoñ	ki	na-farmāni	ka	
tumheiñ	 andesha	 ho	 to	 unheiñ	 samjhāo	
aur	 unse	 alag	 so aur	 unheiñ	 māro	 phir	
agar	wo	tumhāre	hukm	meiñ	ājāyeiñ	to	un	
par	 ziyādati	 ki	 koi	 rāh	 na	 chāho	 beshak	
Allah	bulañd	badā	hai

arabicText: وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ شِقَاقَ بَيْنِهِمَا فَٱبْعَثُوا۟ حَكَمًۭا مِّنْ أَهْلِهِۦ وَحَكَمًۭا مِّنْ أَهْلِهَآ إِن يُرِيدَآ إِصْلَـٰحًۭا يُوَفِّقِ ٱللَّهُ بَيْنَهُمَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا خَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 you	 fear	 a	 dispute	 between	
husband	 and	 wife,	 send	 an	 arbitrator	
from	 the	 man’s	 family	 and	 an	 arbitrator	
from	 the	 woman’s	 family;	 if	 these	 two	
wish	 conciliation,	 Allah will	 unite	 them;	
indeed	Allah is	All	Knowing,	Well	Aware.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	ko	miyāñ	biwi	ke	jhagde	ka	
khauf	ho	to	ek	panch	mard	wāloñ	ki	taraf	
se	bhejo	aur	ek	panch	aurat	wāloñ	ki	taraf	
se	 yeh	 donoñ	 agar	 sulāh	 karāna	 chāheiñ	
ge	to	Allah	un	meiñ	mel	(Muwāfaqat	paida	)	kar	dega	beshak	Allah	jān	ne	wāla	khabar-dār	hai

arabicText: ۞ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشْرِكُوا۟ بِهِۦ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَـٰنًۭا وَبِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱلْجَارِ ذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْجَارِ ٱلْجُنُبِ وَٱلصَّاحِبِ بِٱلْجَنۢبِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ مُخْتَالًۭا فَخُورًا
englishTranslationText:
And	worship	Allah and	do	not	ascribe	any	
partner	 to	 Him,	 and	 be	 good	 to parents,	
and	 to	 relatives,	 and	 orphans,	 and	 the	
needy,	and	the	related	neighbour	and	the	
unrelated	 neighbour,	 and	 the	 close	
companion	 and	 the	 traveller;	 and	 your	
bondwomen;	indeed	Allah does	not	like	any	boastful,	proud	person.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ki	bandagi	karo	aur	uska	shareek	kisi	ko	na	 thahrāo	aur	mā	bāp	se	bhalāi	karo	aur	
risht-e-dāroñ	 aur	 yateemoñ	 aur	 mohtājoñ	 aur	 pās	 ke	 ham	 sāye	 aur	 door	 ke	 ham	 sāye	 aur	
karwat	ke	sāthi	aur	rāh-geer	aur	apni	bāñdi	ghulām	se	aur	beshak	Allah	ko	khush	(Pasand)	nahi	
āta	koi	itrāne	wāla	badāi	mārne	wāla

arabicText: ۞ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشْرِكُوا۟ بِهِۦ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَـٰنًۭا وَبِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱلْجَارِ ذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْجَارِ ٱلْجُنُبِ وَٱلصَّاحِبِ بِٱلْجَنۢبِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ مُخْتَالًۭا فَخُورًا
englishTranslationText:
And	worship	Allah and	do	not	ascribe	any	
partner	 to	 Him,	 and	 be	 good	 to parents,	
and	 to	 relatives,	 and	 orphans,	 and	 the	
needy,	and	the	related	neighbour	and	the	
unrelated	 neighbour,	 and	 the	 close	
companion	 and	 the	 traveller;	 and	 your	
bondwomen;	indeed	Allah does	not	like	any	boastful,	proud	person.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ki	bandagi	karo	aur	uska	shareek	kisi	ko	na	 thahrāo	aur	mā	bāp	se	bhalāi	karo	aur	
risht-e-dāroñ	 aur	 yateemoñ	 aur	 mohtājoñ	 aur	 pās	 ke	 ham	 sāye	 aur	 door	 ke	 ham	 sāye	 aur	
karwat	ke	sāthi	aur	rāh-geer	aur	apni	bāñdi	ghulām	se	aur	beshak	Allah	ko	khush	(Pasand)	nahi	
āta	koi	itrāne	wāla	badāi	mārne	wāla

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبُخْلِ وَيَكْتُمُونَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۗ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًۭا مُّهِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 are	 misers	 and	 preach	 miserliness	 to	 others,	 and	 hide	 what	 Allah has	 bestowed	
upon	 them	 from	 His	 munificence;	 and	We	 have	 kept	 ready	 a	 disgraceful	 punishment	 for	 the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jo	āp	bukhl	kareiñ	aur	auroñ	se	bukhl	ke	liye	kaheñ	aur	Allah	ne	jo	unheiñ	apne	fazl	se	diya	hai	
usey	chupāyeiñ	aur	kāfiroñ	ke	liye	ham	ne	zillat	ka	‘azāb	tayyār	kar	rakha	hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ رِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۗ وَمَن يَكُنِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لَهُۥ قَرِينًۭا فَسَآءَ قَرِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who	 spend	 their	 wealth	 in	
order	for	people	to	see,	and	do	not	accept	
faith	 in	 Allah nor	 the	 Last	 Day;	 and	
whoever	 has	 Satan	 (the	 devil)	 as	 a	
companion	- so	what	an	evil	companion	is	
he!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	apne	māl	logoñ	ke	dikhāwe	ko	
kharch	karte	haiñ	aur	Imān	nahi	lāte	Allah	
aur	 na	 Qayāmat	 par	 aur	 jiska	 musāhib	
(Sāthi	wa Musheer	)	shaitān	huwa	to	kitna	
burā	musāhib	hai

arabicText: وَمَاذَا عَلَيْهِمْ لَوْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمْ عَلِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 what	 would	 they	 lose,	 if	 they	 had	
believed	 in	 Allah and the	 Last	 Day	 and	
spent	from	what	Allah has	bestowed	upon	
them?	And	Allah knows	them	very	well.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unka	 kiyā	 nuqsān	 tha	agar	 Imān	lāte	
Allah	 aur	 Qayāmat	 par	 aur	 Allah	 ke	 diye	
meiñ	 se	 uski	 rāh	 meiñ	 kharch	 karte	 aur	
Allah	unko	jānta	hai.

arabicText: وَمَاذَا عَلَيْهِمْ لَوْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمْ عَلِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 what	 would	 they	 lose,	 if	 they	 had	
believed	 in	 Allah and the	 Last	 Day	 and	
spent	from	what	Allah has	bestowed	upon	
them?	And	Allah knows	them	very	well.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unka	 kiyā	 nuqsān	 tha	agar	 Imān	lāte	
Allah	 aur	 Qayāmat	 par	 aur	 Allah	 ke	 diye	
meiñ	 se	 uski	 rāh	 meiñ	 kharch	 karte	 aur	
Allah	unko	jānta	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ ۖ وَإِن تَكُ حَسَنَةًۭ يُضَـٰعِفْهَا وَيُؤْتِ مِن لَّدُنْهُ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah does	 not	 commit	 even	 the	 least	
injustice;	 and	if	 there	is	 a	 good	 deed,	 He	
doubles	it	and	gives	 from	Himself	a	great	
reward
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ek	zarra	bhar	zulm	nahi	farmāta	aur	
agar	 koi	 neki	 ho	 to	 usey	 dooni	 karta	 aur	
apne	pās	se	badā	sawāb	detā	hai.
